article: pink ribbons are the best-known symbols for breast cancer awareness , but there 's nothing quite like those pink hats _ hundreds of them bobbing along together , racing for the cure _ to make us aware of just how many of our mothers and sisters and daughters and friends are battling this disease .
abstract: woman offers a breast cancer survivor 's inspirations in pink hat
